Pre-Game Insights: The New Orleans Pelicans (6-29) visit the Washington Wizards (6-26) after losing 15 straight road games.
The Pelicans are favored by 4.5 points in the matchup, which tips at 6:00 PM ET on Sunday, January 5, 2025.
Against the spread, New Orleans is 13-22-0 this season.
Washington has 13 wins in 32 games against the spread this season.
The Pelicans have two wins ATS (2-2) as a 4.5-point favorite or greater this year.
As 4.5-point underdogs or more, the Wizards are 12-19 against the spread.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pelicans and their opponents have scored more than 235.5 points in 11 of 35 games this season.
New Orleans has an average total of 223.4 in its outings this year, 12.1 fewer points than this game’s over/under.
The average total for Washington’s games this season is 231.7 points, 3.8 fewer points than this game’s over/under.
The Pelicans score the 19th-most points in the league this season, while the Wizards’ offense racks up the 29th-most.
The Pelicans are the NBA’s 26th-ranked scoring defense while the Wizards are the 16th-ranked.
Others: The game tips at 6:00 PM ET on Sunday, January 5, 2025.
The game is at Capital One Arena in Washington D.C.
The game will be televised on MNMT and Gulf Coast Sports.
